component.name: DebugUtils
component.script:
sub onFileNameSet(event as object) m.debUt = DebugUtils().init(event.getData()) end sub
sub onSettingsSet(event as object) m.debUt.setSettings(event.getData()) end sub sub printDebug(method$ as string, msg = invalid as dynamic)
m.debUt.printDebug(method$, msg) end sub
sub printD(method$ as string, msg = invalid as dynamic) m.debUt.print(method$, msg) end sub
sub printKeyValue(method$ as string, obj as object, props = {} as object) m.debUt.printKeyValue(method$, obj, props) end sub
sub stopD(method$ as string, props as object) m.debUt.stop(method$, props) end sub
